io.sphere.client.shop

Class SphereClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.client.shop.SphereClient

  • @Immutable
public final class SphereClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The main access point to Sphere HTTP APIs. It is essentially just a configured set of services.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      SphereClient(SphereClientConfig config, com.ning.http.client.AsyncHttpClient httpClient, ClientCredentials clientCredentials, ProductService productService, CategoryTree categoryTree, CartService cartService, OrderService orderService, CustomerService customerService, CommentService commentService, ReviewService reviewService, InventoryService inventoryService, ShippingMethodService shippingMethodService, TaxCategoryService taxCategoryService, CustomObjectService customObjectService, ChannelService channelService)

        Creates an instance of SphereClient. All dependencies are configurable. This allows for supplying alternate implementations, for example stubs for testing.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static SphereClient create(SphereClientConfig config)
        Creates an instance of SphereClient.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Closes HTTP connections and shuts down internal thread pools.

        You should call this method right before your application exits, otherwise background threads created by the SphereClient might prevent the process from terminating.

      • getConfig

        public SphereClientConfig getConfig()
        Configuration of the client.
